name: MEGA MAN & BASS
description:
For the entire month of May, Nintendo and Capcom are celebrating our favorite blue bomber, Mega Man, with six game releases on the Virtual Console™ service for the Wii U™ system. Learn more >

Choose either Mega Man or Bass to battle against the latest menace in town. Mega Man can power-charge his cannon, while Bass can rapid-fire in multiple directions. Each with their own unique abilities, canine companions, and motivations to fight, they set out to stop King and his robot army!

King has broken into Dr. Wily's laboratory, stealing data plans to create his own indestructible robot army. Mega Man sets out to protect the world from this latest threat, while Bass wants to prove his power and strength. Play as one of the two rivals, battling against tough enemies and acquiring special weapons to gain powerful new abilities. Find items such as Screws and CDs that are hidden throughout the stages. As you get closer to confronting King, it may come to light that not all is what it seems...

This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
